content.rendered:
Directed by Jeff Wadlow

Written by Todd Berger. Robert Rugan. John R. Morey. Todd Berger

Star Marlon Wayans(Howard Gordon). Priah Ferguson(Sydney Gordon). Kelly Rowland(Emily Gordon). John Michael Higgins(Principal Floyd). Lauren Lapkus(Mayor Tammy). Rob Riggle(Sully). Nia Vardalos(Madam Hawthorne). Abi Monterey(Ramona). Holly J. Barrett(Jamie). Myles Perez(Mario (as Myles Vincent Perez)). Helen Slayton-Hughes(Victoria). Doug Dawson(Stingy Jack Ghost). Pfeiffer Yaeger(Young Victoria). William Finn Carmichael(Skeleton Kid (as Finn Carmichael)). Jonathan Kite(Mr. Skinner). Douglas Hodge(Old Man). Kay Hall(Old Woman). David A. Cooper(Father Ben). Dave Sheridan(Farmer Brown). Keil Oakley Zepernick(Stingy Jack Effigy). Nickolas Wolf(Ringmaster). Mark Steger(Pharaoh Mummy). Gordon Tarpley(High Priest Mummy). Elin Quinn Ponder(Trick or Treat Kid #1). Drew Clavin Farmer(Trick or Treat Kid #2). Catherine J. Agan(Yearbook Photographer (uncredited)). Stefanie Barbato(Suspicious Neighbor (uncredited)). Phoenix Jd Gabe(Demented Jester from Hell (uncredited)). Sharonda Gilbert(Student (uncredited)). Rowan Delana Howard(Trick or Treater Cat (uncredited)). Kevin Howell(Rat Fink (uncredited)). Rekha Letsinger(Pirate (uncredited)). Gloria Mays(Faculty (Face Painter) (uncredited)). Robert Daniel Souris(Fatz the Clown (uncredited)). Juan Szilagyi(Park Halloween Attendee (uncredited)). Stormy Taylor(Trick or Treater (uncredited)). Chris Williams(Quintok the Axe (uncredited)). Sam Zheng(Insane Man in Maze / Sydney’s Friend / Monster Horde Member (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Andrea Ajemian. Rick Alvarez. James Moran. Nathan Talbert Reimann. Jeff Wadlow. Marlon Wayans

Production Ugly Baby Productions
